content: Only one e-ticket per passport can be exchanged at a time. Individual customers are not allowed to purchase or exchange more than one of the same ticket for the same use period
Multiple people are not allowed to share a ticket; the ticket is valid only for the ticket holder whose name is indicated on it
Please be careful not to lose your ticket; no refunds will be issued for lost or stolen tickets

The conditions of use for this ticket are stipulated by the JR-West carriage conditions and the laws of Japan. All information displayed here is subject to change without prior notice. Should any discrepancies arise between the foreign-language and Japanese versions of the carriage conditions, the Japanese version will take precedence
